properties.name: Balikpapan, Indonesia
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldA seaport city on the eastern coast of Borneo island in the East Kalimantan province, this is the location of the Bre-X assay lab

properties.name: Bre-X World Headquarters
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald119 14th St. NW Calgary, Alberta, CanadaThis is where Bre-X boss David Walsh and his staff spent countless fret-filled hours, as the world\'s media waited outside for answers to modern history\'s greatest gold hoax.

properties.name: Bre-X's bonanza town
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldSt. Paul, AlbertaSite of the world’s biggest concentration of Bre-X shareholders. Approximately one in 50 invested.

properties.name: Busang Mine site
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldThe mining site where the golden Bre-X dream started and died. Now an overgrown jungle ruin.

properties.name: Davao, Philippines
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldA sprawling city that serves as the business and tourism hub for the sourthern Philippines, this where Bobby Ramirez works. Private investigators employed by Bre-X concluded that Ramirez waa party to a conspiracy in the tampering.

properties.name: Felderhof Home, Cayman Islands
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldFormer home of John Felderhof

properties.name: Ontario Court of Justice
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald361 University Ave, Toronto, Ontario, CanadaSite of John Felderhof’s trial. The Ontario Securities Commission says he sold 4 million in Bre-X stock in 1996 while he allegedly knew of information not disclosed to investors about the state of Bre-X’s gold desposit in Indonesia.

properties.name: Samarinda, Indonesia
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldA dusty, and polluted city of 700,000, Bre-X had an office and warehouse here. Investigators later surmised this is where the salting occurred.

properties.name: Sanur Beach Hotel, Bali
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald   John Felderhof calls this expansive, five-star resort on Indonesia’s popular tourist island home.

properties.name: The Metro Toronto Convention Centre
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald255 Front Street W Toronto, Ontario, CanadaThe cavernous site of the annual Prospectors and Developers Association of Canada annual convention. Bre-X senior vice president John Felderhof was awarded “Prospector of the Year” for his work at Busang in March 1997, only days before the company’s fortunes began to unravel.

properties.name: Villa Catalina, Philippines
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldA community two hours south of Manila, this is where Cesar Puspos, fingered as one of the men who orchestrated the Bre-X mining deception, grew up. His mother and sister still live here. “It has been 10 years, haven’t we suffered enough?” says his sister Olive.

properties.name: Walsh Home, Bahamas
properties.description: Posted by CalgaryheraldDavid Walsh owned a five-bedroom, two-storey colonial-style home on the island of Nassau. He died of a brain aneurysm here in 1998. A report last year said wife Jeannette had sold the family’s mansion in Nassau and is now living in an apartment on Paradise Island.

properties.name: Walsh home
properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald6 Varbay Place NW Calgary, Alberta, CanadaFormer site of Bre-X Minerals (operated from David Walsh’s basement).

properties.description: Posted by Calgaryherald 100 Front St. Toronto, Canada
